trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Alamo
There were no other sightings in Alamo on or around August 10th 2013
Summary: Flash/starburst of light in night sky coalesced into streaking point of light
divs: sighting detailsi was laying out on the backyard lawn stargazing when a large, bright starburst blazed suddenly to the high southeast. the starburst seemed to shrink into a point of light not unlike an orbiting satellite seen from surface of the earth... it moved off in a straight southwest trajectory and eventually disappeared from my sight. not too much later another satellite-like object appeared. this one changed direction and the color\size\intensity of light\shape seemed to change...
